attributes.additional_details:
National Service should never have been stopped.
Bringing it back woulld get the youths off the
streets and teach them respect for Queen and Country.  They need a sense of belonging
self respect and discipline.  If they want to fight, let them fight as trained soldiers.  At the moment they are being handed money for nothing and costing the country a fortune in benefits and giving nothing in return and as we have seen, running riot in the
streets. How long before they come out with guns
and knives??
